attributes.action: instigate a ban on members of the BNP from entering the teaching profession
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned support the notion mooted by Ed Balls to ban BNP
members from joining the teaching profession. We find it 
reprehensible in the extreme that anyone who has willingly 
joined a political party holding the bigoted views, including 
extreme racism, anti-semitism,  homophobia, class prejudice, Islamophobia and 
sexism, that the BNP support not  should be allowed in the classroom. 
The BNP also have substantial links to extreme rightwing 
neo-nazi terror groups such as Combat18,and has a history of 
violence toward ethinc minorities, LGBT groups, trade unionists 
and other groups. We therefore feel that anyone supporting the 
BNP cannot be allowed to teach especially as such views 
contradict many of the precepts of the school curriculum and principles of the teaching profession.
